channel.title: twitter on David Lilien
channel.description: Recent content in twitter on David Lilien

item.title: Workshop on social media for science communication
item.description: I’ve hesitated to commit to attending a full quarter of science communication classes, but I’ve been trying to take advantage of the half or 1-day workshops that the UW College of the Environment has been offering. This workshop was on using social media to communicate science, which means twitter just got a bunch of new accounts from UW scientists.
